name: Water Drops
description:
Description:

Experience the water cycle as a water droplet and fall through the skies! But watch out for those clouds! If you hit them you will evaporate and miss your droplets friends in the reservoir below. 

Thank you for playing and remember to stay hydrated while playing - this message has been brought to you by your local water agency.

Instructions: 

  • Use the A & D or arrow keys to move your droplet left and right! 
  • Press Shift to increase speed

Extra Credits:

  • Scrunched Font - https://www.dafont.com/scrunched-up.font?back=theme
  • Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.xn--com-5o0a/
  • Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.xn--com-5o0a/
  • Music from https://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/spring-beach1/

Developed together with Jun Rong - https://soulbounded.itch.io/
